activities: We collect personal data to provide customers with our services, send them communication from our services, suggest suitable products, send requested product or service information, respond to customer service requests, administer customers’ accounts with our services, send our customers promotional and marketing communications, respond to customers’ questions and concerns and facilitate customers’ transactions with other users when they use our services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: client and customer online data, manually processed data
